title: How to harvest data from Twitter - Quora

response.answer_text: You would need a web scraping to collect data from twitter or any other website. A web scraper is a bot that visits a specific website and collects information from it, websites like twitter and other big social media sites tend to block web scraping bots from accessing their websites, thus web scrapers use proxy servers to bypass this restriction, here are some scrapers I would recommend for twitter specifically: oxylabs.ioscrapinghub.comoctoparse.com
You can get free data sample by Podargos, with 100% historical and real time tweets for your search criteria. If you have any interest in it, please access Podargos website https://www.podargos.com
